arts.ttl: Parma 2 – Milan 2 | Allegri’s press conference: “Tonight is disappointing…”
arts.sum: AC Milan's boss, Massimiliano Allegri spoke to the media in a press conference following the 2-2 draw against Parma. Against Atalanta, Roma, and Parma, there were several minutes where Milan was overwhelmed... "Paradoxically, we conceded far more chances tonight than against Atalanta and Roma. arts.ttl: Parma 2 – Milan 2 | Allegri to DAZN: “We should have fought more”
arts.sum: Massimiliano Allegri spoke to DAZN after Parma-Milan ended 2-2. These are the words of the Rossoneri coach: After a good first half, that goal came which changed Milan’s game. What happened? “Football matches can turn in an instant, for better or worse. At the end of the first half, the game was under control. We […]

arts.ttl: Allegri fuming with Milan after collapse in Parma: “Two points thrown away”
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher Massimiliano Allegri was understandably frustrated as AC Milan threw away a great position to draw against Parma. Everything was going smoothly for Milan as they scored twice in the opening half-hour of the game. Alexis Saelemaekers got the opener with a lovely shot into the bottom corner from 20 yards, then the Belgian draw a […] The post Allegri fuming with Milan after collapse in Parma: “Two points thrown away” appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: Parma 2 – Milan 2 | Bernabé reacts: “Milan let us play more than other teams do”
arts.sum: Adrian Bernabé, Parma player who scored versus the Rossoneri a beautiful goal, spoke to the microphones of those at Sky Sport Italia after the 2-2 draw against Milan at the Ennio Tardini stadium. Here are his words: "Today Milan let us play more than other teams do. I’m happy for the goal and for the […]

arts.ttl: Parma 2 – Milan 2 | Allegri reacts: “We came back completely asleep…”
arts.sum: After the 2-2 draw against Parma, Massimiliano Allegri spoke to Sky: On the match: "We threw away two points. I don’t know how it would have ended if we had gone into halftime 2-0. We came back on the pitch dazed, completely asleep. When you’re 2-0 up, you can’t concede a goal like that in […]

arts.ttl: Milan squander two-goal lead as Parma fight back for 2-2 draw at the Tardini
arts.sum: Milan wastes a golden chance to move, even if only temporarily, to the top of the table, throwing away a two-goal lead against Parma. It ends 2-2 at the Tardini. Parma-Milan, first half Massimiliano Allegri sticks with continuity, making only one change compared to the lineup against Roma: Estupiñán returns from injury on the left […]

arts.ttl: Parma 2-2 AC Milan: Rossoneri surrender two-goal lead to drop more points
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher AC Milan let more valuable points slip away as they surrendered a two-goal lead against Parma in a 2-2 draw on Saturday night. Milan will be left kicking themselves as they had the game perfectly in hand in the first half. arts.ttl: Watch: Milan go 2-0 up against Parma as Saelemaekers wins penalty and Leao converts
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher AC Milan made it 2-0 inside the opening 25 minutes against Parma, as Rafael Leao followed Alexis Saelemaekers’ opener with a penalty.
